^ While the stone had been sealed by th: dans mundō vītam. ^ on the third day thou didst rise
vitūtēs caelōrum acclāmant: ^ Therefore to thee
column5: the powers of heaven cry out:

mīlitibus corpus immaculātum custodient: Christe. Glōria regnō tuō. ^ Glory to thy resurrection
^ While the stone had been sealed by th: O Christ. Glory to thy kingdom.

mīlitibus corpus immaculātum custodient: hominum ūnus amātor. ^ Glory to thy dispensation
